sentence.Network_en: She sat beside her husband through the livelong night.
sentence.Network_cn: 她坐在她丈夫的身边度过一个漫漫长夜.

sentence.Network_en: He likes to and fish all the livelong day.
sentence.Network_cn: 他喜欢整天其他事都不干,专心于钓鱼.

sentence.Network_en: Also without somebody breathing down your neck all the livelong day!
sentence.Network_cn: 没人整天跟在你屁股后面也比较得心应手吧?

on the road to the short livelong life , it might be your friends who can give you happiness it might be your love make you lovely and it might be your career that can enrich you .在人生短暂而漫长的征途上，给你快乐的也许是你的朋友，让你美丽的也许是你的爱人，令你充实的也许是你的事业。

thy sunbeam comes upon this earth of mine with arms outstretched and stands at my door the livelong day to carry back to thy feet clouds made of my tears and sighs and songs .你的阳光射到我的地上，整天地伸臂站在我门前，把我的眼泪，叹息和歌曲变成的云彩，带回放在你的足边。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English leve longe 'dear long' (see lief, long). The change in spelling of the first word was due to association with live

means.word_mean: 1. perennial northern temperate plant with toothed leaves and heads of small purplish-white flowers
1. (of time) constituting the full extent or duration;

auth_sentence.content: The obscure bird Clamour'd the livelong night.
